Vector2

Radar(Vector2, Vector2, float)

Transform the target position to polar coordinates useful for minimap / radar.

public PolarCoordinates Radar(Vector2 origin, Vector2 target, float maxRange)

Parameters

origin Vector2

The origin of the radar.

target Vector2

The target location.

maxRange float

The max range of the radar.

Returns

PolarCoordinates

Returns relative polar coordinates for the target. The radius is in 0 - 1 range if target is within max range.
